name.zh: 多用途拉链收纳包（多颜色）

description.en: A compact zip pouch designed for everyday organization—ideal for cables, cosmetics, stationery, and small travel essentials. Features a clean rectangular shape, smooth zipper access, and a structured body for easy packing. OEM/ODM customization available for fabrics (including recycled options), size, internal dividers, logo patch, lining, zippers (YKK optional) & hardware, and packaging.
description.zh: 多用途拉链收纳包，适合整理数据线、化妆品、文具与旅行随身小物。长方形包型便于装入背包/行李箱，拉链开合顺滑，包身挺括更好收纳。支持 OEM/ODM 定制：面料（可选再生环保材料）、尺寸、内部分隔、Logo 工艺、内里、拉链（可选 YKK）与五金、包装等。

en: Outer: Nylon / Polyester (customizable; recycled options available)
Zipper: Standard zipper or YKK optional
Logo: Woven label / rubber patch / embroidery (customizable)
zh: 面料：尼龙/涤纶（可定制；可选再生环保材料）
拉链：常规拉链或可选 YKK
拉链头：可做定制拉链头/拉片

en.Use Case: Travel organizer, tech pouch, cosmetics pouch, stationery pouch
en.Customization: Fabric, color, size, logo, lining, internal layout, zipper & puller, packaging

zh.参考尺寸: 宽 18–24cm × 高 12–16cm × 深 5–8cm（可定制）
zh.适用场景: 旅行收纳/数码收纳/化妆包/文具包
zh.颜色款式: 多 SKU 配色（见 variants）
zh.可定制: 面料配色、尺寸、Logo、内里、内部结构、拉链与拉片、包装
